Table.Name: Cluster
Table.Label: Cluster
Table.Description: A Cluster is an MSS Code Factory installation

Table.Name: HostNode
Table.Label: Host Node
Table.Description: An installation cluster usually has many nodes

Table.Name: ISOCcy
Table.Label: ISO Ccy
Table.Description: ISO Ccy is a global static lookup, replicated to all nodes

Table.Name: ISOCtry
Table.Label: ISO Ctry
Table.Description: ISO Ctry implements the ISO 3166 Codes as a global static lookup, replicated to all nodes

Table.Name: ISOLang
Table.Label: ISO Lang
Table.Description: ISO Lang is a global static lookup, replicated to all nodes

Table.Name: ISOTZone
Table.Label: ISO Timezone
Table.Description: ISO Timezone is a global static lookup, replicated to all nodes

Table.Name: SecApp
Table.Label: Security Application
Table.Description: Each application has a particular JEE mount point on each node providing service

Table.Name: SecDevice
Table.Label: Security Device
Table.Description: User device security configuration

Table.Name: SecForm
Table.Label: Security Form
Table.Description: Each form has a JEE servlet mapping name under the application mount point

Table.Name: SecGroup
Table.Label: Security Group
Table.Description: Security groups in a cluster configuration gather user members, sub-groups, and form access grants

Table.Name: SecGroupForm
Table.Label: Security Group Form
Table.Description: Security group form existence grants members of the group access to the specified form

Table.Name: SecGrpInc
Table.Label: Security Group Include
Table.Description: Security groups can include other groups

Table.Name: SecGrpMemb
Table.Label: Security Group Member
Table.Description: Security group members tie the SecUser to specific groups

Table.Name: SecSession
Table.Label: Security Session
Table.Description: Security sessions are valid throughout the cluster

Table.Name: SecUser
Table.Label: Security User
Table.Description: Login and security information is global amongst the clusters

Table.Name: Service
Table.Label: Service
Table.Description: A Service runs on a Host Node

Table.Name: ServiceType
Table.Label: Service Type
Table.Description: Service Type is a global lookup

Table.Name: SysCluster
Table.Label: Cluster
Table.Description: A Cluster is an MSS Code Factory installation

Table.Name: Tenant
Table.Label: Tenant
Table.Description: A Cluster can have any number of Tenants

Table.Name: TSecGroup
Table.Label: Tenant Security Group
Table.Description: Tenant Security groups in a tenant gather user members, sub-groups, and form access grants

Table.Name: TSecGrpInc
Table.Label: Tenant Security Group Include
Table.Description: Tenant Security groups can include other groups

Table.Name: TSecGrpMemb
Table.Label: Tenant Security Group Member
Table.Description: Tenant Security group members tie the SecUser to specific groups
